title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Fry pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs with parmesan. Drain pasta, then mix quickly with pancetta and egg mixture. Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful dish made with tender chicken pieces simmered in a spicy curry sauce.
instructions: Sauté onions until golden. Add curry powder and stir. Add chicken and brown. Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer until chicken is cooked through.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy meal with assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and toss until vegetables are tender-crisp.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa in soft tortillas.
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning until browned. Warm tortillas. Fill with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add eggs and melted butter. Bake at 180°C for 35 minutes. Cool and frost with chocolate icing.
